data.title: Ricky Berens - Men's Swimming and Diving
data.meta_description:
Ricky BerensFly/Free/IM  - 
 • Gold medalist in the 800m freestyle relay at the 2008 Beijing Olympics
 • Gold medalist in the 800m freestyle relay and the 400m
data.text:
• Gold medalist in the 800m freestyle relay at the 2008 Beijing Olympics

• Gold medalist in the 800m freestyle relay and the 400m freestyle relay at the 2009 FINA World Championships

• World record holder, 800m freestyle relay

• 2009 NCAA Champion, 800y freestyle relay

• American record holder, 400y and 800y freestyle relay

• 16-time All-American

• Three-time honorable mention All-American

• Member of Team USA for 2007 Pan American Games (one gold, two silvers)

• 15-time Big 12 Champion

• Two-time Academic All-Big 12

2009 FINA WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS

• split a team-leading 1:44.13 on the second leg of the 800m freestyle relay with UT teammate Dave Walters, Michael Phelps and Ryan Lochte and helped the Americans to gold and a new world record of 6:58.55

• led off the 800m freestyle relay in 1:44.95 in the preliminary round

• swam the third leg of the 400m freestyle relay in 48.19 during the preliminary round; received a gold medal after Team USA won the gold in the finals

2008 BEIJING OLYMPIC GAMES

· Swam in the 800m freestyle relay finals and joined Michael Phelps, Ryan Lochte and Peter Vanderkaay to win gold and set new world and Olympic records in 6:58:56; split 1:46.29 on the third leg

· Competed in the 800m freestyle relay preliminary round with teammate Dave Walters and led the Americans to the top seed in the prelims in a then-Olympic record mark of 7:04.66; split 1:45.47 on the second leg, good for the second-fastest leg among the 64 relay legs swum in the preliminary round

AS A JUNIOR (2008-09)

• joined Dave Walters, Scott Jostes and Michael Klueh to set new American, NCAA, U.S. Open, Big 12 and school records while winning the 800 freestyle relay in 6:10.16 at the NCAA Championships; split 1:32.15 on the second leg

• placed third in the 200 freestyle (1:32.74), third in the 200 IM (1:41.92, new school record) and 24th in the 200 butterfly (1:44.58) at the NCAA Championships

• teamed with Jimmy Feigen, Peter Jameson and Dave Walters to set a new American record and place fourth in the 400 freestyle relay at the NCAA Championships; split 41.83 on the second leg, relay finished in 2:47.02

• joined Hill Taylor, Agustin Magruder and Dave Walters to place fourth in the 400 medley relay at the NCAA Championships; split 45.10 on the butterfly leg, relay finished in 3:03.92

• took first in the 200 IM (1:43.84) and the 200 butterfly (1:43.28) and second in the 100 butterfly (46.31) at the Big 12 Championships

• joined Michael Klueh, Ryan Verlatti and Dave Walters to win the 800 freestyle relay at the Big 12 Championships; led off in 1:32.01, relay finished in 6:15.13

• teamed with Hill Taylor, Agustin Magruder and Jimmy Feigen to win the 200 medley relay at the Big 12 Championships; split 20.49 on the butterfly leg, relay finished in 1:24.23

• joined Hill Taylor, Agustin Magruder and Jimmy Feigen to win the 400 medley relay at the Big 12 Championships; split 45.49 on the butterfly leg, relay finished in 3:06.40

• claimed the 100 butterfly (47.62) and placed third in the 200 backstroke (1:46.88) against SMU

• won the 100 freestyle (44.95) against SMU

• claimed the 100 freestyle against Texas A&M (44.95) and Georgia (44.60)

• captured the 100 butterfly (48.03) and took third in the 100 freestyle (43.96) against Arizona

• claimed the 200 IM (1:48.09) and the 200 butterfly (1:46.69) against Auburn

• captured the 100 butterfly (45.54) and the 200 IM (1:43.73) at the Texas Invitational

• took first in the 100 backstroke (48.10) and the 100 butterfly (47.65) against Washington

• claimed the 200 butterfly (1:46.31) and the 100 butterfly (47.60) and tied for first in the 200 IM (1:46.85) against Indiana and Michigan
